explains: adj. 规定的，法定的；处方的
v. 开 （药、处方）；规定，指定；推荐，推举（prescribe 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: Valium is usually prescribed to treat anxiety.
sentences.cn: 安定剂通常用于治疗焦躁。

sentences.en: She took twice the prescribed dose of sleeping tablets.
sentences.cn: 她服用了所开剂量两倍的安眠药。

sentences.en: The prescribed form must be completed and returned to this office.
sentences.cn: 必须把指定的表格填好并交回本办事处。
